summary: A tutorial on building a custom SQL agent with LangGraph for database querying, covering setup, tool integration, workflow implementation, and human-in-the-loop review.

structure.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent
structure.title: Build a custom SQL agent
structure.summary: A tutorial on building a custom SQL agent with LangGraph for database querying, covering setup, tool integration, workflow implementation, and human-in-the-loop review.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > Concepts
nodes.title: Concepts
nodes.summary: Introduces key concepts for building a custom SQL agent, including tools for SQL databases, the LangGraph Graph API, and human-in-the-loop processes.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > Setup
nodes.title: Setup
nodes.summary: Setup instructions for a custom SQL agent, including installation via pip and LangSmith configuration for monitoring.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > Setup > Installation
nodes.title: Installation
nodes.summary: Installation instructions for setting up a custom SQL agent using pip to install LangChain, LangGraph, and LangChain-Community.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > Setup > LangSmith
nodes.title: LangSmith
nodes.summary: Instructions for setting up LangSmith to monitor and debug SQL agent chains by configuring environment variables.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > 1. Select an LLM
nodes.title: 1. Select an LLM
nodes.summary: Instructions for selecting and initializing LLMs with tool-calling support from various providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Azure, Google Gemini, AWS Bedrock, HuggingFace) using LangChain.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > 2. Configure the database
nodes.title: 2. Configure the database
nodes.summary: This section guides users to set up a SQLite database for the tutorial by downloading the sample Chinook database and using LangChain's SQLDatabase wrapper to interact with it.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > 3. Add tools for database interactions
nodes.title: 3. Add tools for database interactions
nodes.summary: Introduces using SQLDatabaseToolkit from langchain_community to add tools for database interactions, including query execution, schema viewing, table listing, and query validation.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > 4. Define application steps
nodes.title: 4. Define application steps
nodes.summary: Defines custom nodes for a SQL agent's key steps: listing tables, getting schema, generating queries, and checking queries, with code examples for each.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > 5. Implement the agent
nodes.title: 5. Implement the agent
nodes.summary: Assembles a custom SQL agent workflow using LangGraph's Graph API, defining conditional edges for query generation and execution, and demonstrates its invocation with a sample query.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > 6. Implement human-in-the-loop review
nodes.title: 6. Implement human-in-the-loop review
nodes.summary: Demonstrates implementing human-in-the-loop review for SQL agent queries using LangGraph's interrupt and persistence features to pause execution for approval, editing, or feedback.

nodes.path: sql-agent > Build a custom SQL agent > Next steps
nodes.title: Next steps
nodes.summary: Guidance on evaluating SQL agents and LangGraph applications using LangSmith, with additional resources for documentation editing and integration.
